Tests sendMessage with invalid message.
JSON syntax error..
{"error":{"code":-32000,"message":"Message must be a valid JSON"},"id":0}
JSON with primitive value..
{"error":{"code":-32000,"message":"Message must be an object"},"id":0}
JSON without method property..
{"error":{"code":-32000,"message":"Message must have string 'method' porperty"},"id":0}
JSON without id property..
{"error":{"code":-32600,"message":"Message must have integer 'id' porperty"}}
Valid JSON..
{"id":1,"result":{"result":{"type":"number","value":42,"description":"42"}}}
